text: hulachihumi ẖonachihu memeleshachihu wede irisu newi፡፡ (yihimi) yeteregaget’e ye’ālahi k’ali kīdani newi፤ irisu mefit’erini yijemirali፡፡ kezīyami inezīyani yamenutinina melikami yešerutini betikikili yimeneda zenidi yimelisewali፡፡ inezīya yekadutimi yikiduti beneberuti negeri lenerisu kefela wiha yeẖone met’et’ina āsamamī k’it’ati ālachewi፡፡
